main event: A civilian observed a bright white UFO in Calumet Park, Illinois on 9 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter than any previously observed objects., The object disappeared instantaneously after being visible for over 5 minutes., The sighting occurred in extremely clear weather conditions., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 100-150 miles., The witness was a 23-year-old male truck driver who was considered reliable.
witness description: 23-year-old male truck driver, reliable, good knowledge of language
